short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The electronic rosary is a simple application that allows you to count praise and forgiveness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"A quick and easy-to-use tasbeeh (prayer beads), simply press and start from any page you're on.

Press the blue button to increment the counter.
Click on any of the counters and continue using the numeric keypad, letters, space key, or enter key.

How to use:

Install the assistant program.
Install it on the taskbar for easy access.
When you're on a dull page, simply click on the tasbeeh icon and start the remembrance.
To update the remembrance:
Just use the 'Enter Formula' option and set your personal remembrance.
To reset the total count, simply click on it."
